synthesis_analysis: The system excels at initial emotional validation and providing practical micro-steps. Its primary weakness is a rigid adherence to scripted responses, failing to pivot to somatic techniques or concrete tools when explicitly cued by the student. To improve, it must prioritize adaptive engagement by immediately leveraging a student's own solutions and deploying grounding exercises for high anxiety. The highest priority is evolving beyond pre-set scripts to dynamically match communication styles and anxiety cues in real-time.
